1303260.name: Drift Racing Rally
1303260.description:
Play Drift Racing Rally and leave your skid marks on the asphalt! Grip the wheel, pull the handbrake and drift like a maniac, Making donuts drifts like a champion.
Drive you car over ramps to fly and flip you car in air.

Easy to control and fun to play thanks to an innovative drift Gameplay.
Experience all of the excitement, competition and glory of championship racing.

BEWARE the danger of addiction! You may not want to quit & play for hours. Taking a quick break every 40 minutes is strongly advised.

Download this game to feel the joy of racing and drifting!!
1303260.supported_languages:
英语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
